articles.title: Britton Wilson doubles like nobody else in track and field - Home of the Olympic Channel
articles.description: Britton Wilson is attempting an unprecedented 400m-400m hurdles double at the NCAA Track and Field Championships. Then she will race for a spot on Team USA.
articles.content:
Sprinter Britton Wilson regularly updates a vision board in her apartment living room. As of last week, there were two numbers on it among a collage of pictures: 48 and 52.
The 48 is for the 400m. W… [+8273 chars]

articles.title: BYU's Casey Clinger medals at NCAA track and field championships - Deseret News
articles.description: Casey Clinger of the BYU Cougars took third in the 10,000-meter run at the NCAA track and field championships in Austin, Texas, finishing behind Stanford’s Ky Robinson and Charles Hicks
articles.content:
BYUs Casey Clinger, a junior from American Fork, finished third in the 10,000-meter run on Day 1 of the NCAA Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Austin, Texas, on Wednesday.
